original: Lemner, Elis Bernhard, apotekare, Värnamo, f. U/8/92 i Västerås. G. 27. Barn: Bernt Olof f. 27, Bengt Erik 29, Ulla Margareta 31, Kerstin EHsa-bet 34, Klas Tore 40. — Stud:ex. i Västerås 13, farm. kand. 17, apot:ex. 21. Elev v. apot. Hjorten i Västerås o. Lejonet i Gävle 13-16, anst. v. Vita Björnen i Sthlm, Hjorten i Västerås 17-19, i Alingsås, v. Lejonet i Gävle 21 -27, Nordstjärnan i Gävle 27-37 varav som förest, c :a tre år, i Äppelviken 37 -39, priv. å apot. i Kryibo 39, transp. t. apot. i Värnamo 45. Sekr. i Gävleb.-Dala krets av Sv. farm:förb. fl. år, fullm. två år. President f. Värnamo Rotarykl. 47-48.
translated: Lemner, Elis Bernhard, pharmacist, Värnamo, b. 08/08/1892 in Västerås. Married in 1927. Children: Bernt Olof b. 1927, Bengt Erik b. 1929, Ulla Margareta b. 1931, Kerstin Elisabeth b. 1934, Klas Tore b. 1940. Completed secondary school in Västerås in 1913, graduated as a pharmacist in 1917, obtained pharmacy license in 1921. Was an apprentice at Apoteket Hjorten in Västerås and Lejonet in Gävle from 1913-1916, employed at Vita Björnen in Stockholm, Hjorten in Västerås from 1917-1919, in Alingsås, and at Lejonet in Gävle from 1921-1927, and at Nordstjärnan in Gävle from 1927-1937, including three years as head pharmacist. Worked at Apoteket Äppelviken from 1937-1939, privately at Kryibo 1939, and transferred to Apoteket in Värnamo in 1945. Secretary of the Gävleb.-Dala district of the Swedish Pharmaceutical Association for several years, delegate for two years. President of the Värnamo Rotary Club from 1947-1948.

memberOf.name: Gävleb.-Dala district of the Swedish Pharmaceutical Association
